entry.title: POEM 2 REVISING
entry.content:
‘Bent double, like old beggars under sacks,

Knock-kneed, coughing like hags, we cursed through sludge,

Till on the haunting flares we turned our backs

And towards our distant rest began to trudge.

Men marched asleep. Many had lost their boots

But limped on, blood-shod. All went lame; all blind;

Drunk with fatigue; deaf even to the hoots

Of disappointed shells that dropped behind.’

‘Takh, takh’, the gates of hell have been opened

The locust - like imp pounced on the crowd

Fear, panic, despair was darkened

Blood sputtered; all men died after one pace out.

Arms, legs, helmets with bullet holes,

Screech and shot are inundated with this piece of land.

Rifle, Gatling, ruthless roles,

Nonstop shooting kills the last firebrand.

Death was admiring from the other side of the field

the legendary work he was accomplishing.

winds with offensive smell of blood rolled over the weald

carrying souls of the suffering

The mutilated limbs piled up into black and white bushes

nourished by the blood and resistance

The fire flickered again in his eyes

When hearing the horn in the distance

As he raised hand and slowly dimmed the light,

The cruel sickle had been swung

‘My friend, you would not tell with such high zest

To children ardent for some desperate glory,

The old Lie: Dulce et decorum est

Pro patria mori.’

entry.title: POEM
entry.content:
The people among this land should be cheerfully singing

To celebrate the harvest of the past year’s winning

Immersed in winter, winners are singing, the wind is dancing

But who knows, in the heart of this country, the disease is raging

Boom!

A ferocious virus do shake this paradise

While thousands of people are dying

Crack, crack……

They crashed the hope, people’s desire, even kids’ dreams

However, Strong people never fear losing their homes

We know the feature of our future will be brighter

Incompetent officials hide at their sad little nest

Greedy businessmen never stop exploiting

Fearless workers build hospitals day and night

Only for the dark clouds hovering over the city to dissipate

At the time when people are running in different way

Brave angel in white goes against the virus with brave

When I behold of the window at the cloud far away

I was annoyed that I can just hide in this cave

And nothing against time’s scythe can make defence

And I have always believed that the dawn will finally come

entry.title: Reflections about doing part-time job
entry.content:
During the first semester of my second year in high school, I had a lot of free time. So I found a famous restaurant in Nanjing as a part-time job. I do eight hours of part-time work every Saturday. My job is to simply deliver food and clear the table. I didn’t think it would be difficult at first. But when it came down to it, it was really painful.

First of all, some guests like to order a lot of food. This made the size of the tableware he used different, which caused me a lot of trouble in cleaning the table. Moreover, some food scraps will be scattered on the table, and I have to clean them carefully with napkins. The second is the workload. Saturday is a time for many people to go out. The restaurant where I work is in the mall, so the population is even greater. There are peaks at noon and at night. I didn’t have time to take a rest in that hour or two. I was working all the time. It’s a very common phenomenon that the desk can’t be cleaned up on time. What makes me tired is that I only have one hour of rest a day, and I have to stand and take care of the guests for the rest of the day. Every time I get off work, my feet ache.

After experiencing the hard work of the working people at the grassroots level in China, I learned how happy I was to be able to go to school. In the service industry, the payment of service personnel is not directly proportional to their wages. They do the same job every day, working late into the night with little pay. In order to avoid this situation in my future, I must study hard, be a mental worker, and make more contributions to the society.

entry.title: reflection about basic language of Python
entry.content:
Introduction

Python is the first computer programming language I learnt so that I have some thoughts to share about my experience. Compared with human mind, in some ways computer works the same. Most of the programs I learnt so far work based on two logic: True or False and if or else. Computer will make choice according to the content we type in just like human. However, I want to talk more about differences between computer language and human language. When we give somebody an order, we focus on the thesis, details are not so important. Nevertheless, it is totally different in computer language. Every detail must be correct in the code we type, such as the indented block, the symbol, the format of your code and even a blank. If there is only one mistake, the whole program will not work. On the other hand, symbols in computer language are have different meaning compared with it in math. For example, when we want two Boolean values equal, we need to type ‘==’ instead of ‘=’. As a beginner, I have a lot of trouble to use correct symbols when I write code.

Impression

I used to have a question after a few weeks’ learning: Computer is used to help us work more convenient and quickly, but why I seem to spend more time on writing a program? I can finish it much more quickly by myself. The problem bothered me until the teacher gave us an example: A teacher wants to know 10 students average mark after he puts10 results in. I just spent 3 minutes to finish the code instead of adding 10 marks and dividing 10. In my opinion, computer is just a like a little child which only can do any complex calculation and never forget things. In order to let him to solve difficult questions, I need to teach him how to do it and I only teach him once. After that, I just need to type my data and he will give me the answer. I think that is the reason we learn the different computer language.

A flowchart is an important step in writing a program. Flowcharts show the logic you need to write a program in a simple way, helping us tease out the key steps. There are only two sections of the flow chart: the execution section and the judgment section.

Examples

Now I am going to introduce some program that I write.

First program is help customers order their food. During rush hours, many artificial Windows may become. If shop manager can add the self-service ordering machine in the store can greatly reduce the labor workload, in McDonald’s now has such equipment.

Second one is to calculate the monthly payment in a bank. It is extremely difficult for beginners like me to calculate all kinds of figures. Not only the meaning of some data is professional, but also the complex calculation annoy me a lot. That’s the reason that I strongly suggest to use this kind of program.

Here is a flowchart I drew while writing the program. This is a simple login procedure just like QQ. When you put correct name and password in, it will let you pass. We can see that only a simple procedure needs a amount of code and logic, so it is necessary to draw a flowchart.

entry.title: Markdown语法介绍
entry.content:
在前面的课程中，我们已经成功搭建了我们的blog，并将它放到了github通过域 名进行访问，今天我们来学习一下如何用Markdown来写文章。
首先简要介绍一下什么是Markdown：
Markdown 是一种轻量级标记语言，它允许人们使用易读易写的纯文 本格式编写文档。 Markdown 语言在 2004 由约翰·格鲁伯（英语：John Gruber）创建。 Markdown 编写的文档可以导出 HTML 、Word、图像、PDF、Epub 等多种格式的文档。 Markdown 编写的文档后缀为 .md, .markdown。
1.Markdown标题 我们使用#号来标记我们的标题,一共有六级标题,分别对应1到6个#号,如下
对应显示效果如下

一级标题 ## 二级标题 ### 三级标题 #### 四级标题 ##### 五级标题 ###### 六级标题

2、Markdown段落
（1）字体
Markdown支持显示以下几种字体
对应显示效果如下：
（2）分隔线
我们使用三个以上减号来建立分隔线
显示效果如下
（3）删除线
删除线只需要在文字两端加上双波浪线即可~
显示效果如下 HELLO
（4）下划线
斜体文本 斜体文本 粗体文本 粗体文本 粗斜体文本 粗斜体文本
—— 分隔线
~HELLO~~
下划线
显示效果如下
下划线
3、Markdown列表
列表分为有序列表和无序列表
1、无序列表如下所示（注意后面加一个空格）
显示效果如下
第一项 第二项 第三项
2、有序列表如下所示（注意后面加一个空格）
显示效果如下

  1. 第一项 2. 第二项 3. 第三项
    3、列表嵌套用法
    显示效果如下
  2. 第一项：
    第一项嵌套的第一个元素 第一项嵌套的第二个元素
  3. 第二项：
  • 第一项 - 第二项 - 第三项
  1. 第一项 2. 第二项 3. 第三项
  2. 第一项： - 第一项嵌套的第一个元素 - 第一项嵌套的第二个元素 2. 第二项： - 第二项嵌套的第一个元素 - 第二项嵌套的第二个元素
    第二项嵌套的第一个元素 第二项嵌套的第二个元素

    显示效果如下
    引用的一段话，这里演示用。
    5、Markdown代码
    （1）、代码
    显示效果如下
    printf()
    （2）、代码段
    输入如下：
    显示效果如下：
    6、Markdown链接
    如下所示输入超链接
    显示效果如下（可点击跳转百度） 百度

    引用的一段话，这里演示用。
    printf()
    function test() {
    console.log(“Hello world!”);
    }
    百度
    左对齐 右对齐 居中对齐
    单元格 单元格 单元格
    单元格 单元格 单元格
    7、Markdown表格
    实例如下：

    8、Markdown图片
    插入图片我们需要先上传到图床网站获取链接，然后再插入图片链接，具体操作 如下：

  3. 我们首先打开网站https://imgchr.com/ 2. 点击开始上传，上传一张我们想要的图 3. 上传好了我们找到下面Markdown Code并复制
  4. 将复制的链接粘贴过来
    显示成功如下

    | :—–| —-: | :—-: | | 单元格 | 单元格 | 单元格 | | 单元格 | 单元格 | 单元格 |
